Language.name: Submarine Game
Language.description: This is a two players game that consist in two submarines shooting obstacles and gettin coins

Language.name: Snake Game
Language.description: The snake game consist in the snake eating the snack and increasie sice for each snake that eats

Language.name: Mastermind Game
Language.description: The rules are simple. Players take turns trying to crack their secret code using logic and visual hints. The first person to prove they're a mastermind wins!

Language.name: Jumper Game
Language.description: Tension so thick you can cut it with a knife! Jumper seems like a pretty laid back game until it's not! The rules are simple. The jumper guesses letters, one at a time. If the letter's not in the puzzle, the parachute loses a line. Guessing continues until the puzzle is solved or, well, you know.

Language.name: Shopping List
Language.description:
This is a program to help you remember what you have buy it will be in order of priority. 
You will be able to add and remove from the list

Language.name: Geometry Tool
Language.description: Geometry Tool is a program made to find the Area and the Perimeter of a Triangle and Rectangle. The Area of the Rectangle will be find through Heron's Formula since the user is not providing any angle. It has an Menu. The user will introduce their option. It is not case sensity and only will allow the characters shown.
